title: Strategies for Maintaining Principal Leadership and Teacher Dedication

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, emphasizing asynchronous discussions and task completion

learning_goals: They can identify and explain three or more relationship-centered leadership strategies within school organizations.
They can utilize network analysis tools to analyze factors influencing teacher commitment changes.
They can establish and present specific action plans for improving school climate.
They can design preventive leadership approaches to reduce teacher attrition rates.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
